page.title: 18Calver Sough - Commerce.
page.content: Six commercial enterprises have grown around Calver Crossroads. At 240748 is a petrol station with, at the rear, a motor workshop and coach operation. South South East of the crossroads a car sales concern neatly displays cars under what was previously a petrol station canopy. On the east side of Hassop Road a small wooden building houses a busy sweet shop. Just beyond is the Garden Centre. Immediately west of the crossroads is a building which was until recently a boot factory. it now seems little used, with some storage and possibly a small industrial undertaking. To the north of the crossroads is a large modern public house,"The Eyre Arms" and beside it a car park.
